span.span: COVID-19 UPDATE: April 14, 2020 / Two Additional Employees Test Positive

br.span: COVID-19 UPDATE: April 10, 2020 / Second Transportation Department Employee Tests Positive

span.div:
COVID-19 UPDATE: April 2, 2020 - 7:30 p.m.
Changes to Meal Distribution / NTI Extended
Positive Case for COVID-19 Inside GCS

br.span: As a service to our stakeholders, we are providing this recap of the March, 2020, regular meeting of the Grant County Board of Education.
COVID-19 UPDATE: March 24, 2020 / Important Notice re: Meal Delivery

br.a: ALL ELEM/GCMS - Spring MAP Testing Window (Mar 30-Apr 24)
GCHS - SBDM, 3:30 p.m.
DRE - Let It Glow Dance, 3:30 - 5:00 p.m. (Grades 3-5)
GCHS - Prom at Newport Aquarium, 7:0 0- 11:00 p.m.
ALL/COMMUNITY - GC Relatives Raising Children Support Group @ GC Public Library, 6:00 p.m.
GCHS - YSC Food Pantry Distribution, 5:00 - 7:00 p.m.
GCMS - PTT Meeting, 5:30 p.m.
ALL/COMMUNITY - Early Childhood / Grand Camp @ GC Public Library, 8:30 - 11:30 a.m.
COMMUNITY - Champions for a Drug-Free Grant County (at GC Extension Office), 10:00 a.m.
ALL - Board Work Session, 6:15 p.m.
ALL ELEMENTARIES - Last Day for Preschool (Per Original Calendar)
CMZ - SBDM Council Mtg., 6:00 p.m.
GCHS - Registration deadline for June ACT (with no late fee)
CMZ - Awards Program (Gr 1-2), 6:00 p.m. (Per Original Calendar)
CMZ - Awards Program (Gr 3-4), 7:30 p.m. (Per Original Calendar)
MCE - SBDM Council Mtg., 3:30 p.m.
SES - FRC Advisory Council Meeting, 10:00 a.m.
CMZ - 5th Grade Promotion, 6:00 p.m. (Per Original Calendar)
GCHS - YSC Food Pantry Distribution, 5:00 - 7:00 p.m.
GCMS - SBDM Council Mtg., 4:00 p.m.

span.span: The Grant County School District was honored to welcome Mr. Frank DeAngelis, former principal of Columbine High School, and other special guests to our Opening Day.
